abstract: Ryan Adams looks back at his health problems and the struggle to get back to making music for his new album, "Ashes & Fire" (PAX-AM/Capitol), a collection of spare and melancholy songs.
snippet: Ryan Adams looks back at his health problems and the struggle to get back to making music for his new album, "Ashes & Fire" (PAX-AM/Capitol), a collection of spare and melancholy songs.
lead_paragraph: It's been two and half years since Ryan Adams announced he was quitting his band, the Cardinals, and taking a break from music because he had Ménière's disease, a debilitating inner-ear disorder that affects hearing and balance.

headline.main: A Word With: Ryan Adams Returns With New Album After Hiatus
